name: Link Battle
description:
COMPETE WITH YOUR FRIENDS RIGHT NOW!!

Get bored of traditional elimination games? Try "Link Battle" -- one of the most popular puzzle game! Try solving puzzle at a fast pace! Come to the exciting world of Link Battle now! Enjoy fun with players all over the world!!

Goal:
Clear all icons.

Tips:
1. Link 2 same icons to remove them. Linkage should not have over 2 turning points.
2. Don't forget using your items when getting stuck.

Features:
> Easy to learn but hard to master
> Fight your opponent online
> Over 140 challenging levels
> 4 items and 7 upgrades
> Gorgeous graphics
> Fast pace and exciting experience
> Realtime global ranking list

Get it, tap it, and beat your friends to be the fastest!
